title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for May 24
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for May 24
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Triumph Group (TGI). Triumph Group Inc.'s shares are headed for their biggest gain since the aircraft-parts maker went public in 1996. The shares jumped after Triumph resolved a payment dispute with Bombardier Inc. that had put the solvency of its wing-making unit at risk. The settlement followed an agreement with Boeing Co. yesterday that set new parts prices and resolved past claims.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
